channel.title: Webkit on Luca Bruno blog
channel.description: Recent content in Webkit on Luca Bruno blog

item.title: Blogging from Epiphany WebKit
item.description: Hello, I’ve been using Midori for a while. It’s a great browser: innovative and light. However all my bookmarks and data are in Epiphany. Last week the new epiphany-webkit version has been uploaded in Debian Sid and I couldn’t wait to test it. I’m currently using it instead of gecko; it has still some issues but I begun living without it.
